=======For those who are looking for reliable hosting services Noushost.com is the best solution.======

Noushost Offshore Netherlands KVM Linux VPS hosting services provides high port Speeds of 1Gbps. Netherlands Services allows users to utilizefull speeds of KVM VPS just like a Dedicated Server. Each VPS has a Dedicated RAM as well as a Swap Space in order to compensate from unexpected RAM usage. The VPS comes with full root access giving 100% control on it. KVM VPS provides better performance, scalability, density, dynamic resource management, and ease of administration than the alternatives.

Netherlands KVM Linux VPS are on high configured Intel Xeon E3 and E5 servers with RAID10 SATA III HDD`s partitions giving out optimum performances and reliability. Take advantage of our servers, fully redundant fiber network, and our team of specialists in Linux.
